ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to acknowledge Prof Finn Reinholt and Prof. Kari Ormstad, Oslo University, Norway, for providing the human tissue samples used in this work.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: The study was funded by grants from the Swedish Research Council (2014-2348 ME and 2014-3303 PÖ), Alfred Österlund Foundation, the Crafoord Foundation, Swedish Rheumatology Association, IngaBritt and Arne Lundberg Research Foundation (MS instrument), the Krapperup Foundation, Governmental Funding of Clinical Research within National Health Service (ALF) and Foundation for Research in Rheumatology (FOREUM). The funding bodies were not involved in study design or collection, analysis and interpretation of data.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets generated and analysed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
